message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really enjoy it. I'm willing to let it go for $100.
Hi Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested, but I can only pay up to $85 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $85 is a little too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $95? I'm confident you'll still get a great deal.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel $85 would be a fair price for me. I hope we can come to an agreement closer to my budget.
